summary.span: 表示 控件中的元素的线性集合。

span.span: Represents a linear collection of elements in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示联接在一起可操作作为一个组条的条带中的元素。The class represents elements joined together in a band that can be manipulated as a group. 每个元素是通常的一个实例或其派生类之一。Each element is typically an instance of or one of its derived classes. 尽管关联每个带区，标题单元格不被视为带外的元素。Although a is associated with each band, header cells are not considered elements of the band. 是的基类的和类。 is the base class of the and classes. 没有公共构造函数为类型，因此访问带区的唯一方法是通过列和行。There are no public constructors for the type, so the only way to access a band is through columns and rows in a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用用于操纵属性的组中的单元格。The following code example uses a to manipulate properties of groups of cells in a . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewBandDemo.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewBandDemo.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewbanddemo.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法要复制的行或单元格的列。Use this method to duplicate a row or column of cells.

para.span: 在重写派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的带区，并确保也将复制任何已添加到派生的类的属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new band, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

span.span: The associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认单元格样式应用于单元格不具有关联的样式。The default cell style is applied to cells that do not have an associated style. 获取此属性时如果的默认单元格样式不存在，则将创建具有默认值。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the default cell style does not exist. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的第一列的默认单元格样式。The following code example sets the default cell style for the first column in a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性必须获取或设置的实例类或其派生类型之一。This property must get or set an instance of the class or one of its derived types. 例如，类使用为默认标头单元格类型。For example, the class uses a as the default header cell type. 同样，类使用。Similarly, the class uses a . 如果你使用自定义类型派生自中的行或列，属性必须设置为自定义的类型。If you are using a custom type derived from in a row or column, the property must be set to the custom type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与带区关联的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources associated with the band.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法过程中将自动调用垃圾回收，除非已通过调用禁用垃圾回收器的终止方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3). 通过垃圾回收器调用时，此方法调用方法。When called by the garbage collector, this method calls the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当用户滚动 时带区是否移动。

value.span: 如果带区不在视图中滚动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the band cannot be scrolled from view; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性时，可以控制的重要信息带就地在用户滚动浏览。This property can hold a band of important information in place when a user scrolls through the . 与冻结带区相邻将移动在冻结的带区上方。Bands adjacent to the frozen band will move over the frozen band. ## Examples 下面的代码示例会冻结列和行中的单元格的带。The following code example freezes a band of cells in a column and a row. 此示例还更改冻结带区中，以指定哪些带区已冻结的默认单元格样式。The example also changes the default cell style of the frozen bands to specify which bands are frozen. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewBandDemo.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewBandDemo.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewbanddemo.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取指示是否已设置 属性的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the property has been set.

value.span: 如果已设置 属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the property has been set; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取的值属性自动实例化一个新如果以前未访问属性。Getting the value of the property automatically instantiates a new if the property has not previously been accessed. 因此，必须使用属性来确定是否属性当前设置为实例。You must, therefore, use the property to determine whether the property is currently set to a instance. 这可用于确定该对象的哪些属性由属性表示专门为带外设置的样式。This is useful to determine which properties of the object returned by the property represent styles set specifically for the band. 有关单元格样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 获取带区在 控件中的相对位置。

span.span: Gets the relative position of the band within the control.

value.span: 在包含该带区的 或 中，该带区从零开始的位置。

span.span: The zero-based position of the band in the or that it is contained within.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示没有任何关联的 控件。

span.span: The default is -1, indicating that there is no associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值不一定对应到集合中的带区 visual 当前位置。The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the band within the collection. 例如，如果用户对中的列重新排序在运行时 (假设属性设置为`true`) 的值将不会更改每个列的属性。For example, if the user reorders columns in a at run time (assuming the property is set to `true`), the value of the property of each column will not change. 相反，列值的变化。Instead, the column values change. 排序行，但是，会更改其值。Sorting rows, however, does change their values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来设置列标签。The following code example uses the property to set column labels. 带区的通过访问属性。The band's property is accessed through a . > [!NOTE] > 如果启用了可视样式，当前主题将替代标题行和列标题的显示样式属性。If visual styles are enabled, the current theme overrides the display style properties for row and column headers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#150)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#150)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此属性的实现类始终返回`null`因为此基类的类不能包含元素。The implementation of this property in the class always returns `null` because this base class cannot contain elements. 有关样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将影响带区中的每个单元格的属性。The property affects the property of each cell in the band. 例如，如果属性更改，则行中的所有单元格的属性将会更改。For example, if the property of a changes, then the property of all cells in the row will change. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性禁用整个编辑。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to disable editing for an entire . 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以在用户界面 (UI) 中调整带区的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band can be resized in the user interface (UI).

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以阻止用户调整单个行或列通过设置其属性。You can prevent users from resizing individual rows or columns by setting their properties. 默认情况下，属性值根据列的属性值和行的属性值。By default, the property value is based on the property value for columns and the property value for rows. 如果显式设置到或，但是，控件的值被忽略。If you explicitly set to or , however, the control value is ignored. 设置到还原继承。Set to to restore the inheritance. 因为还原值继承，属性将永远不会返回值，除非行或列尚未添加到控件。Because restores the value inheritance, the property will never return a value unless the row or column has not been added to a control. 如果你需要确定是否行或列的属性值将继承，请检查其属性。If you need to determine whether the property value of a row or column is inherited, check its property. 如果值包括标志，不继承属性值。If the value includes the flag, the property value is not inherited. 如果属性值是，用户将不能手动调整带区大小。If the property value is , the user will not be able to manually adjust band size. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性设置为默认值。The following code example sets the property to the default. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/CPP/mousesizing.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/CS/mousesizing.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/VB/mousesizing.vb#14)]
